title: Doom Bots
body:
Bring doom bots back for Halloween it will be a really fun treat. Please up-vote this so everyone can see it :)
100 Up Votes: Amazing
200 Up Votes: Y'all are awesome
300 Up votes: A Red please?
400 Up votes: This has to happen

**Thank you all for the support for the new game mode so far**

replies.body: I'd love another crack at the doom bots.
Now that my former main has been reworked {{champion:41}} Morgana and Lux bot don't stand a chance.
Almost every gangplank that I've seen since rework just places barrels and hides in bushes.. Old gp was way better. I'm not talking about crit plank either :P

i still play old gp when i roll him on aram. maxing everything before i level barrels then chain-busting barrels level 12 as a secondary taunt. with his improved ult, he is just as strong as he was pre-rework  without using barrels.
I agree. Some people (like me), didn't get a chance to play doom bots the first time. And tbh, anything that isn't a normal 5v5 (URF) is fun and hilarious.

They were, by far, my favorite game mode ever.
GAREN IN THE TREES, MAN.

just imagine the new stuff they could add in:

* {{champion:223}} ult on occasion
* gains {{champion:268}} soldiers at random or his Towers pop up on occasion after you destroy a turret
* with the addition of {{champion:236}} to the bots, he could be able to dash every half second with his culling going in all directions and his Q could be a slightly smaller lux beam.
Luc's Q could fire 3 times in quick sucession, and he could dash twice every time instead of once?
Lucian could do one of those hectic sega shooters where his ult just resembles bullet dodge going in all directions
I loved watching the videos of Doom bots. Every 30 seconds Garen comes spinning out of he bushes.
I want the giant tibbers back!

{{champion:203}} DOOMBOT!!! :D
{{champion:245}} DOOMBOT!!! D: **RUNS**
{{champion:432}} DOOMBOT!!! ._. **hides**

{{champion:432}} BWAHDOOOOOOOMBWAAAAAAAHHHHH!

Magical journeys that turn into Malz ults and meeps that attack like Fizz Sharks.

Make sure to Add Darius. 

His passive stacks infinitely

His Q turns into Garen's spin.

His W slows for 99% for 5 seconds and has the same damage as old W and effects as well.

His pull can pull you 5 times in a row. And his bonus armor penetration becomes 99%

His Ult is repeated the amount of stacks you have on the champion

Riot plz
I wouldn't poke that Darius with a 10 foot pole 0_0
What if you could throw that pole? {{champion:76}}
slow is less now
This is for Doom Bots.

oh, yeah,

duh XD
I joined after it was gone :( Please Riot. Trick or Treat?
I wonder... Would it be a Trick? or a Treat?

maybe with some updates to their ai

split pushing them was too easy
It was also about the only way to beat them.
I never loved and hated {{champion:11}} more than in that game mode. >_<

{{champion:61}} Was ridiculously over powered in that game mode, the bots had no idea how to properly gauge the threat of the ball, so every time they grouped it was just R, W, and let your team engage

Doom bot katarina.
everytime uses shunpo it procs {{champion:25}}  spellshield(stop interupts)
every Q hit procs a W at targets location(on every target hit)
when she R's she gains 2 or 3 pulses of {{champion:61}} R to pull enemies into her.

if it does come back, it will be the only mode so far I will not touch.
I've seen footage of the doom bots, and I want no part in the horrow >.<
*hides under bed from bullet hell abilities*

Trollsticks is always watching

{{champion:9}}
Trollsticks sounds like he needs some time alone on the One For All update. Like a Tahm Feared forever.
Doom Bots was fun for maybe 1-2 games. Its novelty wore off faster than URF's or OFA's. Actually, even Hexakill offered more interesting gameplay than Doom Bots.
Oh good, I was worried I was the only one. Like, I love bots being harder, but they just blatantly cheated and you were just supposed to accept that. It wasn't fun after the novelty wore off.
I feel like it depends on the player. I didn't like Hexakill because it wasn't on Summoners Rift. If it was on Summoners Rift it would of been so much of a better experience.
what is doom bots? also i want urf mode i never played that either

Doombots are basically Coop vs AI on crack. Things like Lux shooting out 8 Final Sparks in all directions, to garen's randomly spawning in bushes if you face-check them. It was absolute chaos, and really fun to play.

sounds like a mode more fun than any other mode live, id like to play that. intermediate is too easy for me these days, its more about covering and carrying the feeding teammates than beating the bots atm.
I wish they kept these game modes up forever. I don't know why they take them down.

Its to avoid burnout. They want these modes to be really exciting events, and if they're around all the time, then they just end up being commonplace. Its also somewhat to counteract meta-formation within the modes, as once people start bitching amongst themselves about which champions are statistically the most overpowered, then the fun train tends to derail rather quickly as people who want to play suboptimal champs into those modes get shunned or flamed at by those who care about those types of things. Tbh They work better as seasonal things.

> [{quoted}](name=GlockChime,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=EyEAIyvg,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2015-10-19T20:25:09.000+0000)
>
> Its to avoid burnout. They want these modes to be really exciting events, and if they're around all the time, then they just end up being commonplace. Its also somewhat to counteract meta-formation within the modes, as once people start bitching amongst themselves about which champions are statistically the most overpowered, then the fun train tends to derail rather quickly as people who want to play suboptimal champs into those modes get shunned or flamed at by those who care about those types of things. Tbh They work better as seasonal things.

That happens anyway. When URF came back people already had a meta of champs that would be OP.
And if you didn't take TP, you would be reported.

Thank you all for all the support for this. Maybe if it doesn't come out this month hopefully after seeing this riot will think of adding it back for a short time in the future. My reason for wanting this is so I cant stand withing the horror of doom bots and say I have won.
Amp it up a notch. Urf DOOM BOTS
They should have doom bots as a permanent mode on coop vs AI because the normal mode is ridiculously ez and needs an update... doom bots would be perfect for the next lvl after normal
Maybe not a permanent game mode but one they should really think about switching in a lot more.
Doom bots is way more fun than one for all.
I farking loved doom bots
Only if they could make Doom PvP. That would take a LOT of work though for each individual champ.

I say bring it. Would be rather fun to see since it reminds me of Man vs Machine in TF2 ... except the gameplay is different obviously.
Would love to play that mode regardless :)
{{champion:17}}'s r will have no cooldown and with a 0.5 cooldown and instantly arms.
Nah. He would throw them out in clusters that when hit will cause viktor's trap thing to arm that holds you there xD.
